original_text: But maybe he does not want to listen to you. Then take one or two other people with you to speak to him. They will then know what wrong things your friend has done. Remember what the Bible says: “There must be two or three people to say certainly that another person has done something wrong. Two or three people must agree what has happened.”
korean_text: 만일 듣지 않거든 한두 사람을 데리고 가서 두세 증인의 입으로 말마다 확증하게 하라

sentences.original_text: But maybe he does not want to listen to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그가 당신의 말을 듣고 싶어하지 않을 수도 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then take one or two other people with you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 한두 명의 다른 사람과 함께 가십시오

sentences.original_text: what wrong things your friend has done.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 친구가 어떤 잘못된 일을 했는지를.

sentences.original_text: There must be two or three people
to say certainly that another person has done something wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람이 무언가 잘못했다고 확실히 말하기 위해.

sentences.original_text: Two or three people must agree
